text: Envy is a 2004 American dark comedy movie directed by Barry Levinson and starring Ben Stiller, Jack Black, Christopher Walken, Rachel Weisz, Amy Poehler. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures and was a commercial failure. ==Other websites== * Category:2004 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Barry Levinson Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: Envy (2004 movie)
